content: 1 The word of Yahweh which came unto Zephaniah､ son of Cushi､ son of Gedaliah, son of Amariah､ son of Hezekiah,—in the days of Josiah son of Amon､ king of Judah.
content_old: 1 The word of Yahweh which came unto Zephaniah､ son of Cushi､ son of Gedaliah, son of Amariah､ son of Hezekiah,—in the days of Josiah son of Amon､ king of Judah.

content: 2 I will take clean away everything from off the face of the ground､ Declareth Yahweh.
content_old: 2 I will take clean away everything from off the face of the ground､ Declareth Yahweh.

content: 3 I will take away man and beast､ I will take away the bird of the heavens and the fishes of the sea, And the stumblingblocks､ even them who are lawless,— And will cut off mankind､ from off the face of the ground､ Declareth Yahweh.
content_old: 3 I will take away man and beast､ I will take away the bird of the heavens and the fishes of the sea, And the stumblingblocks､ even them who are lawless,— And will cut off mankind､ from off the face of the ground､ Declareth Yahweh.

content: 4 And I will stretch out my hand— Over Judah, and Over all the inhabitants of Jerusalem,— And will cut off out of this place､ The name of Baal, The name of the priestlings､ with the priests;
content_old: 4 And I will stretch out my hand— Over Judah, and Over all the inhabitants of Jerusalem,— And will cut off out of this place､ The name of Baal, The name of the priestlings､ with the priests;

content: 5 And them who bow down upon the housetops､ to the host of the heavens,— And them who bow down— Who swear to Yahweh, And swear by Milcom;
content_old: 5 And them who bow down upon the housetops､ to the host of the heavens,— And them who bow down— Who swear to Yahweh, And swear by Milcom;

content: 6 And them who turn away from following Yahweh,—､ And have neither sought Yahweh､ nor enquired for him.
content_old: 6 And them who turn away from following Yahweh,—､ And have neither sought Yahweh､ nor enquired for him.

content: 7 Hush! at the presence of My Lord､ Yahweh,— For near is the day of Yahweh, For Yahweh hath prepared his sacrifice､ hath hallowed his guests.
content_old: 7 Hush! at the presence of My Lord､ Yahweh,— For near is the day of Yahweh, For Yahweh hath prepared his sacrifice､ hath hallowed his guests.

content: 8 And it shall come to pass in the day of Yahweh’s sacrifice That I will punish The rulers､ And the sons of the king,— And all such as are clothed with foreign apparel;
content_old: 8 And it shall come to pass in the day of Yahweh’s sacrifice That I will punish The rulers､ And the sons of the king,— And all such as are clothed with foreign apparel;

content: 9 And I will punish Every one who leapeth over the threshold､ in that day,— Those who fill the house of their lords with violence and deceit.
content_old: 9 And I will punish Every one who leapeth over the threshold､ in that day,— Those who fill the house of their lords with violence and deceit.

content: 10 And there shall come to be､ in that day､ Declareth Yahweh､ The noise of an outcry from the fishgate, And of a howling out of the new city,— And of a great crashing､ from the hills.
content_old: 10 And there shall come to be､ in that day､ Declareth Yahweh､ The noise of an outcry from the fishgate, And of a howling out of the new city,— And of a great crashing､ from the hills.

content: 11 Howl､ ye inhabitants of the lower city,— Because destroyed are all the people of traffic, Cut off are all they who were laden with silver.
content_old: 11 Howl､ ye inhabitants of the lower city,— Because destroyed are all the people of traffic, Cut off are all they who were laden with silver.

content: 12 And it shall come to pass､ at that time, That I will search through Jerusalem､ with lamps,— And will punish the men Who are thickened upon their lees, Who are saying in their heart､ Yahweh will not give blessing､ Neither will he bring calamity.
content_old: 12 And it shall come to pass､ at that time, That I will search through Jerusalem､ with lamps,— And will punish the men Who are thickened upon their lees, Who are saying in their heart､ Yahweh will not give blessing､ Neither will he bring calamity.

content: 13 Therefore shall Their goods become a booty, and Their houses､ a desolation,— And they shall build houses､ but not inhabit them, And plant vineyards､ but not drink the wine thereof.
content_old: 13 Therefore shall Their goods become a booty, and Their houses､ a desolation,— And they shall build houses､ but not inhabit them, And plant vineyards､ but not drink the wine thereof.

content: 14 Near is the great day of Yahweh, Near､ and very speedy,— The noise of the day of Yahweh, A strong man—there!—bitterly crying out!
content_old: 14 Near is the great day of Yahweh, Near､ and very speedy,— The noise of the day of Yahweh, A strong man—there!—bitterly crying out!

content: 15 A day of indignation—that day! Day of danger and distress､ Day of rush､ and of crash, Day of obscurity､ and deep gloom, Day of cloud､ and thick darkness;
content_old: 15 A day of indignation—that day! Day of danger and distress､ Day of rush､ and of crash, Day of obscurity､ and deep gloom, Day of cloud､ and thick darkness;

content: 16 Day of horn､ and war-shout,— Against the fortified cities, and Against the high towers.
content_old: 16 Day of horn､ and war-shout,— Against the fortified cities, and Against the high towers.

content: 17 And I will bring distress to mankind､ And they shall walk like them who are blind, Because against Yahweh have they sinned,— And their blood shall be poured out as dust, And their bowels like dung.
content_old: 17 And I will bring distress to mankind､ And they shall walk like them who are blind, Because against Yahweh have they sinned,— And their blood shall be poured out as dust, And their bowels like dung.

content: 1 Collect your thoughts, aye collect them,— O nation depressed!
content_old: 1 Collect your thoughts, aye collect them,— O nation depressed!

content: 2 Ere yet the decree have given birt , Like chaff the day have vanished,— Ere yet shall come upon you､ The glow of the anger of Yahweh, Ere yet shall come upon you､ The day of the anger of Yahweh.
content_old: 2 Ere yet the decree have given birt , Like chaff the day have vanished,— Ere yet shall come upon you､ The glow of the anger of Yahweh, Ere yet shall come upon you､ The day of the anger of Yahweh.

content: 3 Seek Yahweh— All ye lowly of the land, Who have wrought what he appointed,— Seek righteousness､ Seek humility, Peradventure ye shall be concealed, In the day of the anger of Yahweh.
content_old: 3 Seek Yahweh— All ye lowly of the land, Who have wrought what he appointed,— Seek righteousness､ Seek humility, Peradventure ye shall be concealed, In the day of the anger of Yahweh.

content: 4 For Gaza forsaken shall be, And Ashkelon a desolation,— Ashdod! at high noon shall they drive her forth, And Ekron be uprooted:
content_old: 4 For Gaza forsaken shall be, And Ashkelon a desolation,— Ashdod! at high noon shall they drive her forth, And Ekron be uprooted:

content: 5 Alas! for the inhabitants of the line of the sea､ The nation of Kerethim,— The word of Yahweh is against you､ O Canaan of the land of the Philistines, Therefore will I destroy thee､ to the last inhabitant.
content_old: 5 Alas! for the inhabitants of the line of the sea､ The nation of Kerethim,— The word of Yahweh is against you､ O Canaan of the land of the Philistines, Therefore will I destroy thee､ to the last inhabitant.

content: 6 So shall the line of the sea become a meadow､ The wells of shepherds､ And the folds of flocks;
content_old: 6 So shall the line of the sea become a meadow､ The wells of shepherds､ And the folds of flocks;

content: 7 And the line shall belong to the remnant of the house of Judah､ Thereon shall they feed their flocks,— In the houses of Ashkelon shall they at eventide lie down, For Yahweh their God will visit them､ And bring their captives back.
content_old: 7 And the line shall belong to the remnant of the house of Judah､ Thereon shall they feed their flocks,— In the houses of Ashkelon shall they at eventide lie down, For Yahweh their God will visit them､ And bring their captives back.

content: 8 I have heard the reproach of Moab, And the revilings of the sons of Ammon,— Who have reproached my people, And have magnified themselves up to their bounds.
content_old: 8 I have heard the reproach of Moab, And the revilings of the sons of Ammon,— Who have reproached my people, And have magnified themselves up to their bounds.

content: 9 Wherefore as I live Declareth Yahweh of hosts､ God of Israel､ Surely Moab like Sodom shall become､ And the sons of Ammon like Gomorrah, A possession for the thorn､ And a pit of salt､ Yea a desolation､ unto times age-abiding: The remnant of my people shall make of them a prey, And the residue of my nation shall inherit them.
content_old: 9 Wherefore as I live Declareth Yahweh of hosts､ God of Israel､ Surely Moab like Sodom shall become､ And the sons of Ammon like Gomorrah, A possession for the thorn､ And a pit of salt､ Yea a desolation､ unto times age-abiding: The remnant of my people shall make of them a prey, And the residue of my nation shall inherit them.

content: 10 This shall they have､ instead of their pride,— Because they reproached and magnified themselves against the people of Yahweh of hosts.
content_old: 10 This shall they have､ instead of their pride,— Because they reproached and magnified themselves against the people of Yahweh of hosts.

content: 11 Terrible will Yahweh be against them, For he hath caused to waste away all the gods of the earth,— That men may bow down to him､ Every one from his place, All the coastlands of the nations:
content_old: 11 Terrible will Yahweh be against them, For he hath caused to waste away all the gods of the earth,— That men may bow down to him､ Every one from his place, All the coastlands of the nations:

content: 12 Even ye Ethiopians, The slain of my sword were they!
content_old: 12 Even ye Ethiopians, The slain of my sword were they!

content: 13 And may he stretch out his hand against the North, And destroy Assyria,— And may he make of Nineveh a desolation, Dry as the desert!
content_old: 13 And may he stretch out his hand against the North, And destroy Assyria,— And may he make of Nineveh a desolation, Dry as the desert!

content: 14 So shall lie down in her midst—flocks､ Each living thing of a nation, Both pelican and bittern in her capitals shall roost,— A voice shall resound in the window､ The bustard､ on the sill, For he hath destroyed､ hath laid bare.
content_old: 14 So shall lie down in her midst—flocks､ Each living thing of a nation, Both pelican and bittern in her capitals shall roost,— A voice shall resound in the window､ The bustard､ on the sill, For he hath destroyed､ hath laid bare.

content: 1 Alas for her that is rebellious､ and polluted, The city that oppresseth!
content_old: 1 Alas for her that is rebellious､ and polluted, The city that oppresseth!

content: 2 She hath hearkened to no voice, Accepted no correction; In Yahweh hath not trusted, To her God hath not drawn near:
content_old: 2 She hath hearkened to no voice, Accepted no correction; In Yahweh hath not trusted, To her God hath not drawn near:

content: 3 Her rulers in her midst are roaring lions,— Her judges evening wolves, They have left nothing until morning!
content_old: 3 Her rulers in her midst are roaring lions,— Her judges evening wolves, They have left nothing until morning!

content: 4 Her prophets are reckless, Treacherous men! Her priests have profaned the holy, Done violence to law.
content_old: 4 Her prophets are reckless, Treacherous men! Her priests have profaned the holy, Done violence to law.

content: 5 Yahweh､ the Righteous One is in her midst, He dealeth not perversely,— Morning by morning his justice bringeth he forth to light､ He is not found lacking, But the perverse man knoweth no shame.
content_old: 5 Yahweh､ the Righteous One is in her midst, He dealeth not perversely,— Morning by morning his justice bringeth he forth to light､ He is not found lacking, But the perverse man knoweth no shame.

content: 6 I have cut off nations､ Deserted are their towers, Have made desolate their streets､ That none passeth through; Ruined are their cities､ For want of men of note､ From lack of any dweller!
content_old: 6 I have cut off nations､ Deserted are their towers, Have made desolate their streets､ That none passeth through; Ruined are their cities､ For want of men of note､ From lack of any dweller!

content: 7 I said､ Surely thou wilt reverence Me､ Wilt accept correction, Lest her abode should be cut off､ Howsoever I had punished her; But in truth they soon corrupted all their deeds.
content_old: 7 I said､ Surely thou wilt reverence Me､ Wilt accept correction, Lest her abode should be cut off､ Howsoever I had punished her; But in truth they soon corrupted all their deeds.

content: 8 Wherefore wait for me､ Urgeth Yahweh, Until the day when I rise up as witness, For my decision is To gather nations､ To assemble kingdoms､ To pour out on them mine indignation､ All the glow of mine anger, For in the fire of my jealousy shall be devoured the whole earth.
content_old: 8 Wherefore wait for me､ Urgeth Yahweh, Until the day when I rise up as witness, For my decision is To gather nations､ To assemble kingdoms､ To pour out on them mine indignation､ All the glow of mine anger, For in the fire of my jealousy shall be devoured the whole earth.

content: 9 Surely then will I turn unto the peoples a lip made pure,— That they all may call on the name of Yahweh, May serve him with one consent.
content_old: 9 Surely then will I turn unto the peoples a lip made pure,— That they all may call on the name of Yahweh, May serve him with one consent.

content: 10 From beyond the rivers of Ethiopia Shall come my suppliants､ The daughter of my dispersed ones Shall bear along a gift for me.
content_old: 10 From beyond the rivers of Ethiopia Shall come my suppliants､ The daughter of my dispersed ones Shall bear along a gift for me.

content: 11 In that day Wilt thou not turn pale､ for all thy deeds, wherein thou hast transgressed against me? For then will I take away out of thy midst thy proudly exulting ones, And thou shalt not again be haughty any more in my holy mountain:
content_old: 11 In that day Wilt thou not turn pale､ for all thy deeds, wherein thou hast transgressed against me? For then will I take away out of thy midst thy proudly exulting ones, And thou shalt not again be haughty any more in my holy mountain:

content: 12 So will I leave remaining in thy midst, a people oppressed and poor,—who will seek refuge in the name of Yahweh:
content_old: 12 So will I leave remaining in thy midst, a people oppressed and poor,—who will seek refuge in the name of Yahweh:

content: 13 The remnant of Israel— Will not do perversity､ Nor speak falsehood, Neither shall there be found in their mouth a tongue of deceit,— Surely they shall feed and lie down､ With none to make them afraid.
content_old: 13 The remnant of Israel— Will not do perversity､ Nor speak falsehood, Neither shall there be found in their mouth a tongue of deceit,— Surely they shall feed and lie down､ With none to make them afraid.

content: 14 Sing out､ O daughter of Zion, Shout aloud､ O Israel,— Rejoice and exult with all thy heart, O daughter､ Jerusalem:
content_old: 14 Sing out､ O daughter of Zion, Shout aloud､ O Israel,— Rejoice and exult with all thy heart, O daughter､ Jerusalem:

content: 15 Yahweh hath set aside thy judgments, hath turned back thy foe,— The king of Israel､ Yahweh is in thy midst, Thou shalt not fear calamity､ any more.
content_old: 15 Yahweh hath set aside thy judgments, hath turned back thy foe,— The king of Israel､ Yahweh is in thy midst, Thou shalt not fear calamity､ any more.

content: 16 In that day shall it be said— To Jerusalem Do not fear,— O Zion Let not thy hands hang down:
content_old: 16 In that day shall it be said— To Jerusalem Do not fear,— O Zion Let not thy hands hang down:

content: 17 Yahweh､ thy God､ in the midst of thee As a mighty one Will save,— Will be glad over thee with rejoicing､ Will be silent in his love, Will exult over thee with shouts of triumph.
content_old: 17 Yahweh､ thy God､ in the midst of thee As a mighty one Will save,— Will be glad over thee with rejoicing､ Will be silent in his love, Will exult over thee with shouts of triumph.

content: 18 The sad exiles from the appointed meeting have I gathered､ From thee had they been! But were a burden on thee—a reproach!
content_old: 18 The sad exiles from the appointed meeting have I gathered､ From thee had they been! But were a burden on thee—a reproach!

content: 19 Behold me! dealing with all thine oppressors､ at that time,— And I will save her that is lame､ And her that hath been an outcast will I carry, And I will make them to be a Praise and a Name､ In the whole earth that hath witnessed their shame.
content_old: 19 Behold me! dealing with all thine oppressors､ at that time,— And I will save her that is lame､ And her that hath been an outcast will I carry, And I will make them to be a Praise and a Name､ In the whole earth that hath witnessed their shame.
